benchmark_details.name: FieldWorkArena: Agentic AI Benchmark for Real Field Work Tasks
benchmark_details.overview: This paper proposes FieldWorkArena, a benchmark for agentic AI targeting real-world field work, specifically to evaluate agents in monitoring and reporting safety and health incidents in real world work environments.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark suite aimed at promoting the introduction of agentic AI in performing monitoring tasks in real-world field work environments.

data.source: Data obtained from actual work sites including videos from factories and warehouses, work manuals, and related safety regulations.
data.annotation: Manually annotated ground truth data validated by multiple workers.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on the ratio of correct tasks to total tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance of the agentic AI in real-world tasks.
methodology.validation: Tasks validated against ground truths generated through interviews with workers.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Consent was obtained from all workers appearing in the footage, and necessary face blurring was performed.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data is licensed under a special-purpose license that does not allow commercial use.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: All video data collected with consent from individuals.
